Sinopse: Riding his black steed, the Devil's left hand, Guerrero, continues to hunt down wicked souls for his unholy master after the events of Dead in Tombstone (2013). But trouble comes in threes, and when the infernal executioner crosses paths with dangerous Colonel Jackson Boomer and his posse of ex-Confederates in his hometown of Silver River, war is on Guerrero's doorstep. And with his family in grave danger, Guerrero must ensure that an ancient tome of dark incantations capable of unleashing Hell on Earth will not fall into the wrong hands. This time, death is guaranteed. But can one die twice?—Nick Riganas
